name: emi.emi-wn
releaseNotes:
added dependencies on:

        openldap-clients python-ldap glite-lb-client-progs perl-dpm perl-lfc dpm-devel lfc-devel

        32b clients for DPM, LFC, GFAL/lcg_util

    For more details on the changes introduces by the new clients please read the Release Notes of DPM/LFC v. 1.8.4 and GFAL/lcg_util v. 1.13.9



    new version of the EMI WN documentation containing more details regarding client provided, installation and configuration
